description: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS will make its closest approach to Earth on Dec. 19, passing safely at a vast distance. Discovered by NASA-funded telescopes, the rare visitor offers scientists a valuable chance to study material formed around another star. Observations from space telescopes are expected to deepen understanding of interstellar objects.
title: Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS to Make Closest Approach to Earth on December 19

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has confirmed the first runaway supermassive black hole, moving at 2.2 million mph through the Cosmic Owl galaxies. Pushing a galaxy-sized shockwave and leaving a long trail of star-forming gas, this discovery confirms long-standing theories about black hole ejections and opens the door to finding more cosmic speedsters.
title: James Webb Confirms First Runaway Supermassive Black Hole Rocking Through Space

description: New research suggests the James Webb Space Telescope could help uncover the true nature of dark matter. By observing strange, elongated galaxies in the early universe, scientists believe JWST may reveal how dark matter shaped cosmic structure, offering clues that could narrow down long-standing theories about this invisible substance.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Could Illuminate Dark Matter in an Unexpected Way

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover, in excellent condition, is ready for long-term Mars exploration. Using autonomous driving, it has travelled nearly 25 miles, studied olivine-rich rocks, and collected samples revealing potential signs of past microbial life. The rover now heads to Lac de Charmes for further scientific investigation, promising years of discoveries about Mars’ geology and habitability.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Poised for Years of Exploration Across Jezero Crater

description: Researchers in China have demonstrated the first high-temperature superconducting diode, operating above liquid nitrogen temperatures without magnetic fields. Using cuprate materials, the device enables clean supercurrent flow and could reduce noise in quantum computers. The breakthrough marks an important step toward practical superconducting electronics and more stable quantum technologies.
title: Physicists Push Superconducting Diodes to Higher Temperatures

description: With its unique style of barging into the houses, cutting the roofs and then beginning a heist. Roofman is a nickname given to the person who does so. The series is based on real footage, people and journalists. It has been directed Derek Cianfrance. Now out on OTT, Lionsgate Play!
title: The Roofman Now Streaming Online: Everything You Need to Know

description: Adobe has upgraded Firefly with new AI models and editing tools, while also offering a limited-time perk for paid users. Until January 15, Firefly Pro and Premium subscribers can generate unlimited AI images and videos. New additions include text-based video editing, better camera control, and support for third-party models like Runway, Topaz, and Black Forest Labs, giving creators more flexibility and control.
title: Adobe Firefly Platform Updated With New AI Models and Tools, Offers Limited-Time Unlimited Generations

description: Boat has launched the Valour Ring 1 in India as a screen-free smart ring focused on continuous health and fitness tracking. Priced at Rs. 11,999, it features a lightweight titanium build, weighs under 6g, and supports heart rate, SpO2, HRV, sleep, stress, and activity tracking with 40+ sports modes. The ring offers up to 15 days of battery life, USB Type-C charging, 5 ATM water resistance, and works with the Boat Crest app for health insights.
title: Boat Valour Ring 1 Launched in India With Heart Rate Variability Tracking, Up to 15-Day Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Grand Theft Auto 6 or GTA 6 is set to be the Rockstar Games’ successor to 2013's GTA 5. The much-anticipated release of the open-world game is currently scheduled for November 19, 2026. However, the developer appears to be still ironing out some wrinkles to avoid a Cyberpunk 2077-like disaster, as the release was recently pushed from May 2026 to November 2026. Here, we have put together a GTA 6 map guide for you, giving a peek into the diverse regions that will be in the game.
title: GTA 6 Map Guide Explained: Here’s All You Need to Know About Different Areas, Biomes

description: This feature highlights some of the best wireless earbuds available under Rs 8,000 in India, focusing on active noise cancellation, sound quality, comfort, and battery life. Options include the Sony WF-C710N with reliable ANC and smart features, JBL Tune Beam 2 with strong bass and spatial audio, OnePlus Buds 4 offering powerful ANC and gaming features, Noise Master Buds with Bose-tuned sound and long battery life, and Beats Solo Buds for users prioritising sound and seamless connectivity over ANC.
title: Best ANC Wireless Earbuds Under Rs 8,000: Sony WF-C710N, OnePlus Buds 4, Beats Solo Buds and More

description: Battlefield 6 is the 2025's best-selling game in the US year-to-date, according to data from Circana. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 emerged as the top selling title in November, but is trailing to Battlefield 6 in year-to-date sales.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Was the Best-Selling Game in the US in November, but Trails Battlefield 6 in 2025

description: WhatsApp is one of the popular messaging applications available in the world.  The Meta-owned platform is constantly adding new features to increase the user experience. However, common users are still not aware of many great features. In this article, we explore some of these lesser-known features to help you use WhatsApp more efficiently.
title: Top Useful WhatsApp Features You Might Not Know: Chat Lock, Message Editing, More

description: Google has integrated its Opal experiment into Gemini’s web interface, letting users create small AI-powered apps directly inside the chatbot. The vibe-coding tool turns prompts into reusable mini apps, which are saved as Gems for repeated use. Opal has steadily expanded beyond the US after gaining traction, and Google has also refined its visual editor for more control.
title: Google Brings Opal, an AI-Powered Mini App Builder Tool to Gemini

description: OpenAI has opened ChatGPT app integrations to third-party developers, allowing them to submit apps for review and list them directly inside the chatbot. Once approved, these apps let ChatGPT’s AI agent perform tasks across services like shopping, design, or travel. The move reinforces OpenAI’s push to evolve ChatGPT beyond a chatbot and closer to an operating system.
title: OpenAI Starts Reviewing Third-Party App Submissions for ChatGPT Integration

description: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G was launched in select EU countries in September. Now, the Chinese tech firm has confirmed that it will soon launch the tablet in India, too. However, the key specifications, features, and the exact launch date remain under wraps, which the company will start teasing from December 22. In Europe, the Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G is sold in Lavender Purple, Silver, and Graphite Gray colourways. It packs a 12,000mAh battery with 33W wired fast charging support.
title: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G India Launch Teased Soon After Global Debut: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Truecaller launched a free Voicemail feature for Android users in India. This offers instant transcription, and messages are stored directly on the device. It also offers smart call categorisation, spam filtering, adjustable playback speed and AI-powered voicemail transcription in 12 Indian languages. Truecaller users can set up unlimited voicemail in their Truecaller app for free in a few seconds.
title: Truecaller Voicemail Feature Launched for Android Users in India With Transcription in 12 Regional Languages

description: Samsung will reveal its AI-powered home appliances at CES 2026 in Las Vegas, running from January 6 to January 9. It will showcase upgraded Bespoke AI AirDresser, Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, WindFree Air Conditioner, and Bespoke AI Jet Bot Steam Ultra robot vacuum. The 2026 Bespoke AI Laundry Combo will come with enhanced wash-to-dry cycles and drying performance. The newly launched Bespoke AI Jet Bot Steam Ultra robot vacuum cleaner will use the Qualcomm Dragonwing chipset.
title: CES 2026: Samsung to Unveil Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, Jet Bot Steam Ultra Robot Vacuum, and More

description: Samsung’s upcoming Exynos 2600 chipset has leaked ahead of the Galaxy S26 launch, revealing key CPU and GPU details. Shared by a tipster, the 2nm chip is said to feature a 10-core CPU with a 3.9GHz prime core and an AMD-based Xclipse GPU clocked at around 985MHz. Benchmark listings suggest strong multi-core performance. The chip may power Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus models in select regions, while Snapdragon variants are expected elsewhere.
title: Samsung Exynos 2600 Details Leak Ahead of Galaxy S26 Launch; Could Be Equipped With 10-Core CPU, AMD GPU

description: Nvidia may cut production of its GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs by up to 40 percent in early 2026, according to a report. The move is linked to ongoing memory shortages, especially affecting GDDR7-based cards like the RTX 5070 Ti and RTX 5060 Ti 16GB. AI data centres are reportedly soaking up memory supply, squeezing consumer graphics cards.
title: Nvidia to Reportedly Cut GeForce RTX 50 Series GPU Production Amid Global RAM Shortage

description: Vivo could be preparing to launch two new smartphones as part of its Y series, as Vivo Y50s 5G and Vivo 50e 5G have been spotted on the list of supported devices of Google Play Console. Additionally, a mysterious Vivo phone with the model number V2531A has visited China's 3C certification website. More details about the three handsets are expected to be revealed in the coming months. This comes months after the tech firm unveiled the Vivo Y50 5G and Vivo Y50m 5G.
title: Vivo Y50e 5G, Vivo Y50s 5G Appear on Google Play Console; Mysterious Vivo Phone Listed on Certification Site

description: Apple has introduced major changes to iOS and the App Store in Japan under the Mobile Software Competition Act, effective December 18. Rolled out with iOS 26.2, the update allows alternative app marketplaces, new payment options, and user choice for default apps. Apple has also updated fees, introduced safeguards for security and child safety, and expanded developer tools, including alternative browser engines and side button access for voice apps. The changes apply only to iOS apps distributed in Japan.
title: Apple Allows Third-Party App Stores, Relaxes Payment Restrictions in Japan to Comply With MSCA Act

description: Apple's foldable smartphone is said to be in the works. Most recently, CAD renders of the device have leaked on the Web. The foldable iPhone appears to have two outward-facing cameras. The external screen is 139.4 millimetres (5.49 inches) diagonally. The internal screen is said to have a 7.76-inch screen.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Bears Resemblance to iPad Mini in Leaked CAD Renders

description: Easygoing Defense by the Optimistic Lord is an upcoming isekai anime streaming on Crunchyroll in January 2026. Adapted from a popular web novel and light novel series, the anime focuses on strategic thinking, production magic, and territory management. With strong pre-release buzz on social media and an experienced production team, the series is expected to appeal to fans of intelligent fantasy and character-driven storytelling.
title: Easygoing Defense by the Optimistic Lord Anime to Stream on Crunchyroll in January 2026

description: Eko is an upcoming Malayalam mystery sci-fi film set to release on Netflix. Directed by Dinjith Ayyathan and produced by MRK Jhayaram under Aaradyaa Studios, the film has gained attention for its modern themes, atmospheric visuals, and strong performances.
title: Eko OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Streaming as a Sun NXT Exclusive, Ethirneechal Thodargiradhu carries forward the emotional and empowering journey of Ethir Neechal. With an IMDb rating of 7.9/10 for the original series, the show remains a strong voice for women-led storytelling in Tamil television.
title: Ethirneechal Thodargiradhu Now Streaming on SunNXT: What You Need to Know

description: Hogwarts Legacy sales have reached 40 million copies, Warner Bros. Games announced Wednesday. The Wizarding World action-adventure game has reached the impressive sales milestone in less than three years of launch. Hogwarts Legacy is currently free on Epic Games Store.
title: Hogwarts Legacy Has Sold 40 Million Copies, Warner Bros. Games Announces

description: Infinix Xpad Edge has been launched in Malaysia. The new tablet has a 13.2-inch display with 2.4K resolution. An 8-megapixel single camera, 8,000mAh battery and quad speakers are the other key specifications of the tablet. The Infinix Xpad Edge Snapdragon 685 chipset, alongside 8GB RAM and 256GB of storage
title: Infinix Xpad Edge Launched With 13.2-Inch Display, 8,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: A OnePlus smartphone has been listed on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) certification website with the CPH2793 model number. This suggests that the Chinese smartphone maker could launch the handset soon in India. However, the company has yet to confirm the same. It is expected to be the third model in the flagship lineup, which currently includes the OnePlus 15 and the recently launched OnePlus 15R. The phone could succeed this year's OnePlus 13s.
title: OnePlus 15s Listing on BIS Certification Website Hints at Imminent Launch in India

description: The OTT platforms are geared up to drop intense dramas, thrillers, romance, and more for the week. Top releases include Thamma, Raat Akeli Hai, Emily in Paris S5, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Dec 15 - Dec 21): Thamma, Mrs Deshpande, Raat Akeli Hai: The Bansal Murders, Fallout Season 2, and More

description: The Villainess Is Adored by the Prince of the Neighbor Kingdom is a Japanese Anime series that is an adaptation of the light novel.
title: The Villainess Is Adored by the Prince of the Neighbor Kingdom OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Japanese Anime Series Online

description: OnePlus Watch Lite has been launched alongside the OnePlus 15R as a more affordable smartwatch. It features a 1.46-inch AMOLED display with up to 3,000 nits peak brightness, runs OxygenOS Watch 7.1, and supports Android and iOS devices. The watch offers extensive health and fitness tracking, Bluetooth calling, GPS, and cross-device pairing via a future update. OnePlus claims up to 10 days of battery life. It is available in select European markets starting at EUR 159 (roughly Rs. 16,800).
title: OnePlus Watch Lite Launched With 1.46-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to 10 Days Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Poco M8 Pro and Poco M8 could be launched soon by the Xiaomi sub-brand, as the phones have already visited multiple certification websites. Now, the renders of the handsets have surfaced online, revealing their design and colourways. The two phones could be offered in three colourways. The company could equip them with redesigned squircle-shaped camera modules, instead of the circular ones on the Poco M7 series. However, the company has yet to confirm the launch of the phones.
title: Poco M8 Series Design, Colourways Spotted in Leaked Renders; Could Feature a Redesigned Camera Module

description: Pornhub is reportedly facing an extortion attempt after hackers linked to the ShinyHunters group claimed to have stolen data of more than 200 million Premium users. The attackers have threatened to publish the data unless a Bitcoin ransom is paid. While samples shared with the media appear genuine, questions remain around how recent the data is and how the breach occurred.
title: Pornhub User Data Reportedly Stolen by Hacker Group ShinyHunters, Threaten to Expose

description: Apple confirmed that more ads will appear in App Store search results starting next year, helping advertisers increase their opportunities to drive downloads from search results. The brand confirmed that Advertisers and developers won’t need to make any changes to their campaigns to avail new positions. Currently, the App Store displays only one ad at the top of search results.
title: Apple's App Store to Introduce Additional Ads Across Search Queries in 2026

description: Lara Craft is coming to mobile devices. Crystal Dynamics' 2013 Tomb Raider reboot will launch on iOS and Android on February 12, 2026, developed Feral Interactive announced Wednesday. The mobile version of the console game will come with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and 12 DLC packs.
title: Crystal Dynamics' 2013 Tomb Raider Reboot Is Coming to Mobile Devices Next Year

description: Google is rolling out a small second December 2025 update for select Pixel phones, following the Android 16 QPR2 release and December Pixel Drop. Reddit users report that the roughly 25MB OTA is reaching some Pixel 8, 9, and 10 models, mainly in the US, with limited availability elsewhere. Google has not shared official details, but Verizon says the update fixes battery drain, Pixel 10 touch issues, and problems accessing cached offline content after upgrading to Android 16.
title: Google Pixel Phones Reportedly Receive Second December Update With Fixes for Battery, Touch Issues

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra will be launched later this month as part of the tech firm’s flagship smartphone lineup, the company announced on Thursday. At present, the Xiaomi 17 lineup contains a standard, a Pro, and a Pro Max model. While the Xiaomi 17 Ultra’s key specifications, like its chipset, battery, display, and design, remain under wraps, the company has revealed that the phone will launch with a Leica-tuned camera unit. Recent reports suggest that the handset will be powered by Qualcomm’s flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Launch Timeline Confirmed; Will Feature Leica-Tuned Cameras: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Google released Gemini 3 Flash on Wednesday as the latest entrant in the Gemini 3 series. The artificial intelligence (AI) model joins Gemini 3 Pro and Gemini 3 Deep Think, and brings speed, efficiency, and lower token cost for users and developers. Arriving a month after the release of the previous two models, Google says the Flash variant is powerful enough to outperform 3 Pro in coding-related tasks.
title: Google Releases Gemini 3 Flash, Outperforms 3 Pro Model in Speed and Coding Performance
